thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Stericycle Inc Posts Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $4.34

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Stericycle Inc Posts Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $4.34
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - Stericycle Inc:
* STERICYCLE, INC. REPORTS RESULTS FOR THE FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR ENDED 2017
* Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $4.34 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.97 * Q4 REVENUE FELL 2.1 PERCENT TO $887.8 MILLION * ‍RECORDED A PROVISIONAL AMOUNT OF $129.8 MILLION AS AN INCOME TAX BENEFIT IN Q4 OF 2017​
* SEES 2018 REVENUES IN THE RANGE OF $3.48 BILLION TO $3.63 BILLION ‍​
* SEES 2018 DILUTED EARNINGS PER SHARE IN THE RANGE OF $2.09 TO $2.21‍​
* SEES 2018 ADJUSTED DILUTED EARNINGS PER SHARE IN THE RANGE OF $4.45 - $4.85 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
